title: Tesla Says XAI Stands for "EXploratory AI." Does It?
description: In a recent proxy statement about Elon Musk's compensation package, Tesla said xAI's name stood for "eXploratory Artificial Intelligence." Huh?
content:
Last week, Tesla unveiled a ten-year compensation plan for Elon Musk that could turn him into a trillionaire. Perhaps by accident, it may have also invented an alter ego for one of Musk's other major holdings, xAI.

title: AI-powered digital inspections: How connected worker platforms transform compliance in manufacturing
description: Inspections once carried the weight of routine drudgery:stacks of forms, signatures collected like stamps, and processes that slowed down precisely when they needed to be sharp. title: Some public service jobs will be cut as Ottawa adopts AI: chief data officer
